transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Contract_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Execution_Date as string,
		Termination_Date as string,
		Contracted_Party_Company_Name as string,
		Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract as string,
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Type_of_goods_or_services as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Execution_Date as date,
		Termination_Date as date,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as decimal(19,4),
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity3 as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Contract_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\n      ,[Execution_Date]\n      ,[Termination_Date]\n      ,[Company_Name]\n      ,[Contract_Value]\n      ,[Contract_Currency]\n      ,[Contract_Type]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity1]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity2]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity3]\n      ,[Insert_Datetime]\n      ,[Contract_ID]\n FROM [relational].[OPS_Contract]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalContractLkp
LookupContract derive(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Contract_ID),"Null Contract ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Contract_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Contract ID not belong to Asset/"),""),
		ContractValueValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal), "Contract Value/", ""),
		ExecutionDateValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Execution_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Execution_Date_toDate)),"","Execution Date/"),"Execution Date/"),
		TerminationDateValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Termination_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Termination_Date_toDate)),"","Termination Date/"),"Termination Date/"),
		TypeOfGoodsAndServiceValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Type_of_goods_or_services),"Type of Goods and Services/",""),
		ContractCurrencyValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Contract_Currency),"Contract Currency/",""),
		Entity1ValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_1),"Entity 1/","")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg,
ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg,
ContractValueValidateMsg,
ExecutionDateValidateMsg,
TerminationDateValidateMsg,
TypeOfGoodsAndServiceValidateMsg,
ContractCurrencyValidateMsg,
Entity1ValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date = Execution_Date_toDate,
		Termination_Date = Termination_Date_toDate,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg, ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg, LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg, ContractValueValidateMsg,
ExecutionDateValidateMsg,TerminationDateValidateMsg,TypeOfGoodsAndServiceValidateMsg,ContractCurrencyValidateMsg,Entity1ValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Execution_Date)) || not(isNull(Termination_Date)) || 
not(isNull(Contracted_Party_Company_Name)) || not(isNull(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract)) || not(isNull(Contract_Currency)) || 
not(isNull(Type_of_goods_or_services)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_1)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_2)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_3))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Execution_Date_toDate = toDate(Execution_Date),
		Termination_Date_toDate = toDate(Termination_Date),
		Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal = toDecimal(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract, 19, 4),
		Contract_ID = toInteger(Contract_ID),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date = Execution_Date_toDate,
		Termination_Date = Termination_Date_toDate,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime_Lkp) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalContractLkp select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date_Lkp = Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date_Lkp = Termination_Date,
		Company_Name_Lkp = Company_Name,
		Contract_Value_Lkp = Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency_Lkp = Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type_Lkp = Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1_Lkp = Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2_Lkp = Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3_Lkp = Executed_By_Entity3,
		Insert_Datetime_Lkp = Insert_Datetime,
		Contract_ID_Lkp = Contract_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectContractLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectContractLkp lookup(Contract_ID == Contract_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupContract
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectColumnsOutputUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'Update'))],
	mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Executed_By_Entity3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistenParquetUpdate

		Reporting_Period
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),

		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Execution_Date as date,

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Harvest_Unit as string,
		Harvest_Operation_Type as string,
		Product as string,
		Species as string,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit as string,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement as string,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT as string,
		Predicted_Revenue as string,
		Predicted_Stumpage as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Fees_Levies_etc as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Cartage as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Harvesting as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Other as string,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation as string,
		Actual_Revenue as string,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT as string,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Managers_Fees_Levies as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Cartage as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Harvesting as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Other as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Operation_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Operation_Type_Code]\n      ,[Operation_Type]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Operation_Type]\nWHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOperationType
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\n FROM [relational].[OPS_Species_Type]\n WHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalSpeciesType
LookupSpeciesType derive(OperationTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Operation_Type_Code_Lkp), "Operation Type/", ""),
		SpeciesTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), "Species Type/", ""),
		PredictedHarvestedGmtValidateMssg = iif(not(isNull(Predicted_Harvested_GMT)),iif(not(isNull(Predicted_Harvested_GMT_toDecimal)),"","Predicted Harvested GMT/"),"Predicted Harvested GMT/"),
		ActualHarvestedGmtValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Actual_Harvested_GMT)),iif(not(isNull(Actual_Harvested_GMT_toDecimal)),"","Actual Harvested GMT/"),"Actual Harvested GMT/"),
		ActualHarvestCommencementValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Actual_Harvest_Commencement)),iif(not(isNull(Actual_Harvest_Commencement_toDate)),"","Actual Harvest Commencement/"),"Actual Harvest Commencement/"),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',OperationTypeValidateMsg, SpeciesTypeValidateMsg, PredictedHarvestedGmtValidateMssg, ActualHarvestedGmtValidateMsg, ActualHarvestCommencementValidateMsg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Code = Product,
		Species_Code = Species_Code_Lkp,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT = Predicted_Harvested_GMT_toDecimal,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement = Actual_Harvest_Commencement_toDate,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation = Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT = Actual_Harvested_GMT_toDecimal,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(OperationTypeValidateMsg,SpeciesTypeValidateMsg,PredictedHarvestedGmtValidateMssg,ActualHarvestedGmtValidateMsg,ActualHarvestCommencementValidateMsg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type = Harvest_Operation_Type,
		Product,
		Species,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Harvest_Unit)) || not(isNull(Harvest_Operation_Type)) || not(isNull(Product)) || 
not(isNull(Species)) || not(isNull(Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit)) || not(isNull(Actual_Harvest_Commencement)) || 
not(isNull(Predicted_Harvested_GMT)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Revenue)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Fees_Levies_etc)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Cartage)) || 
not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Harvesting)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Other)) || 
not(isNull(Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation)) || not(isNull(Actual_Revenue)) || not(isNull(Actual_Harvested_GMT)) || not(isNull(Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area)) || 
not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Managers_Fees_Levies)) || not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Cartage)) || not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Harvesting)) || 
not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance)) || not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Other))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit = toDecimal(Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit, 19, 4),
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT_toDecimal = toDecimal(Predicted_Harvested_GMT, 19, 4),
		Predicted_Revenue = toDecimal(Predicted_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Predicted_Stumpage = toDecimal(Predicted_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement_toDate = toDate(Actual_Harvest_Commencement),
		Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation = toDate(Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation),
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area = toDecimal(Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area, 19, 4),
		Actual_Harvested_GMT_toDecimal = toDecimal(Actual_Harvested_GMT, 19, 4),
		Actual_Revenue = toDecimal(Actual_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Managers_Fees_Levies, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Cartage = toDecimal(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Cartage, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting = toDecimal(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Harvesting, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = toDecimal(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Other = toDecimal(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Other, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Managers_Fees_Levies, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Cartage = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Cartage, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Harvesting = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Harvesting, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Other = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Other, 19, 4)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOperationType select(mapColumn(
		Operation_Type_Code_Lkp = Operation_Type_Code,
		Operation_Type_Lkp = Operation_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOperationTypeLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectOperationTypeLkp lookup(Harvest_Operation_Type == Operation_Type_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupOperationType
RelationalSpeciesType select(mapColumn(

		Species_Lkp = Species
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSpeciesTypeLkp
LookupOperationType, SelectSpeciesTypeLkp lookup(Species == Species_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSpeciesType
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,

	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Operation_Type_Code]\n      ,[Operation_Type]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Operation_Type]\nWHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOperationType
LookupOperationType derive(OperationTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Operation_Type_Code_Lkp), "Operation Type/", ""),
		AreaTreatedValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Area_Treated)),iif(not(isNull(Area_Treated_toDecimal)),"","Area Treated/"),"Area Treated/"),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',OperationTypeValidateMsg, AreaTreatedValidateMsg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Area_Treated = Area_Treated_toDecimal,
		Treatment_Cost = Cost_of_Treatment,
		Unit_Cost = Average_Unit_Cost,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,

	),

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert

ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost = Cost_of_Treatment,
		Unit_Cost = Average_Unit_Cost,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date = Date_Last_Age_Class_Established,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate = Survival_rate_of_last_age_class_established,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Operation_Type)) || not(isNull(Area_Treated)) || not(isNull(Cost_of_Treatment)) || 
not(isNull(Budget_Area_Treated)) || not(isNull(Budget_Treatment_Cost)) || 
not(isNull(Date_Last_Age_Class_Established)) || not(isNull(Species_Survived)) || not(isNull(Survival_rate_of_last_age_class_established))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,

		Average_Unit_Cost = toDecimal(Average_Unit_Cost, 19, 4),

		Budget_Area_Treated = toDecimal(Budget_Area_Treated, 19, 4),
		Budget_Treatment_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Treatment_Cost, 19, 4),

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Sales_Type as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as string,
		Total_Revenue as string,
		Total_Sales_Costs as string,
		Total_Net_Revenue as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Units_Sold as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Sales_Costs as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
ExcludeFirstRowandEmpty derive(Sales_Type_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Sales_Type),'Sales Type/',''),
		Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Total_Revenue_toDecimal),'Total_Revenue/',''),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sales_Type,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue = Total_Revenue_toDecimal,
		Sales_Cost = Total_Sales_Costs,
		Sales_Net_Revenue = Total_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = Budget_Units_Sold,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sales_Type,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue = Total_Revenue,
		Sales_Cost = Total_Sales_Costs,
		Sales_Net_Revenue = Total_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = Budget_Units_Sold,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DataTypeTransformations keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Sales_Type)) || not(isNull(Sales_UOM)) || not(isNull(Sales_Point)) || 
not(isNull(Total_Units_Sold)) || not(isNull(Total_Revenue)) || not(isNull(Total_Sales_Costs)) || 
not(isNull(Currency_Code)) || not(isNull(Budget_Units_Sold)) || 
not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Revenue)) || not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Costs))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRowandEmpty
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Total_Units_Sold = toDecimal(Total_Units_Sold,19,4),
		Total_Revenue_toDecimal = toDecimal(Total_Revenue,19,4),
		Total_Sales_Costs = toDecimal(Total_Sales_Costs,19,4),
		Total_Net_Revenue = toDecimal(Total_Net_Revenue,19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit = toDecimal(Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,19,4),
		Budget_Units_Sold = toDecimal(Budget_Units_Sold,19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue,19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Costs = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Costs,19,4)) ~> DataTypeTransformations
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sales_Type,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sales_Type,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

	WorkbookName as string,

}
source(output(

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectKeyColumnsForDelete
SelectKeyColumnsForDelete aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod
AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod alterRow(deleteIf(UniqueCount>0)) ~> AlterRowDelete
AlterRowDelete sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational
